doc.title: Mindhunter
doc.plot: In this compelling documentary, John Douglas, a former FBI criminal profiler, uses his investigative skills and expertise to go head-to-head with two convicted serial killers: rapist-murderer Joseph Kondro, who targeted his friends' children and eventually pleaded guilty to the murders of two young girls; and Donald Harvey, a cunning killer who preyed on helpless patients in the hospitals where he worked and called himself a mercy killer
